## Load necessary libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Read in data & make object. 
```{r}
bd_data <- # this line of code assigns a name to the line of code below. 
  read_csv(fil = "output/bd_results_and_environmental_metadata.csv") 
```

## Make a simple xy point plot comparing body_temp_c to bd_amount
```{r}
ggplot(data = bd_data) +
  geom_point(aes(x = body_temp_c, 
                 y = bd_amount))
```
